name: Decisional AI
headline: AI Agent for private markets that accelerates deep financial work
description: Decisional is building an AI Financial Analyst for Private Market Investors that pulls information from public and private data sources. Financial Services firms like LTV Capital use our AI Agent to gain superhuman abilities like gleaning insights from thousands of data rooms or documents & magically modelling spreadsheets in seconds
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:fintech; industry:saas; industry:finance; industry:b2b; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Dhruv Tandon, Co-Founder, CEO
founders.description: CEO & Co-founder @ Decisional AI. LBS and BITS Pilani grad. Building an AI Agent that I would have loved to use as an Financial Analyst. Previously, Product at Razorpay (W15), Drip Capital (S15) and an Analyst at Moonfire Ventures & Concentric Capital.

founders.name: Sai Neeraj Kanuri, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder & Head of Engineering at Decisional AI. NYU grad. Laying the groundwork for an AI Agent that can reliably work for Finance. Previously, engineering at Razorpay (YC W15) and Arthur AI, an ML platform that helps financial services firms like J.P Morgan reduce hallucinations.

founders.name: Adit Sanghvi, Founder
founders.description: CTO & Co-founder at Decisional AI, building the brain of an AI Agent for Finance. CMU Grad. Previously, worked in deep learning and machine learning at Uber and generated incremental $100m+ in revenue. Hold patents and papers on AI since 2017, before it was cool.

generated_description:
**Decisional AI: Revolutionizing Financial Analysis with AI**

Founded in 2024 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S24, Decisional AI is making waves from its San Francisco headquarters. The mission? To create an AI Agent designed specifically for private markets, capable of streamlining and enhancing deep financial analysis. Think of it as an AI Financial Analyst that allows private market investors to sift through vast amounts of public and private data effortlessly.

**What Do They Do?**

At its core, Decisional AI provides cutting-edge tools for financial firms, like LTV Capital, helping them unlock superhuman capabilities. This includes extracting insights from thousands of documents and designing complex financial models in a fraction of the usual time. Imagine saving over 100 hours each week and achieving nearly three times the accuracy of the latest AI models like GPT-4—this is the transformative power Decisional AI offers.

Their platform integrates seamlessly with existing workflows, offering features like:

- **Deep Search and Qualitative Analysis**: Dive into qualitative metrics with surface-level insights from your critical data sources.
- **Quantitative Analysis**: Quickly model financial metrics with high accuracy, useful for portfolio monitoring.
- **Custom Visualizations**: Create visual data representations that highlight key trends and metrics, such as Revenue and Gross Margin.
- **Document Management**: Efficiently manage and interact with a vault of over 50,000 documents in various formats, including Excel and PDFs.

**Who’s Behind the Curtain?**

The team might be small, boasting only three employees, but their ambitions are large. With Aaron Epstein as their Group Partner, they're setting the stage for something significant in the finance sector.

**The Future Looks Bright**

Decisional AI is poised to reshape how financial analysis is conducted, effectively blending machine efficiency with human insight. With users reporting significant reductions in operational time and enhanced decision-making capabilities, it’s clear that the blend of AI and finance is not just a trend; it’s the future.

For a closer look at how Decisional AI can transform your financial practices, check out their website: [Decisional AI](https://www.decisional.com/).

**Key Takeaways:**
- **Location**: San Francisco
- **Founded**: 2024
- **Team**: 3 Employees
- **Mission**: To build an AI Agent that enhances financial analysis for private markets.
- **Website**: [Decisional AI](https://www.decisional.com/)

This is just the beginning for Decisional AI. Watch this space—there's going to be a lot to follow.
